newsitem.title: UK: TABLE-Cookson pre-tax profits 85.4 mln stg.
newsitem.headline: TABLE-Cookson pre-tax profits 85.4 mln stg.

text.p: NOTE - *The profits are pre-exceptionals. Post exceptional profits remained same in the current year but is comparable to 69.2 million stg in the previous year.
Analysts expected the profits to be between 82.5 and 85.0 million stg.
Full company name - Cookson Group Plc.
